Airhypo Cyberfinger.name: Airhypo Cyberfinger
Airhypo Cyberfinger.description: Cyberfinger that holds an Airhypo. Can only be installed on a modular finger cyberhand.

Ballpoint Cyberfinger.name: Ballpoint Cyberfinger
Ballpoint Cyberfinger.description: Cyberfinger with a ballpoint pen inside. Can only be installed on a modular finger cyberhand.

Budget Chipware Socket.name: Budget Chipware Socket
Budget Chipware Socket.description: A cheap socket for a single installation of chipware. Damage to the head sends the installed chipware 30 m/yds away, potentially breaking it.

Bullet Storage Cyberfinger.name: Bullet Storage Cyberfinger
Bullet Storage Cyberfinger.description: Cyberfinger that can be used to conceal two rounds of ammunition of any type. Can only be installed on a modular finger cyberhand.

Dartgun Cyberfinger.name: Dartgun Cyberfinger
Dartgun Cyberfinger.description: Cyberfinger that holds a concealed Dartgun. Can only be installed on a modular finger cyberhand.

Discount Cyberaudio Suite.name: Discount Cyberaudio Suite
Discount Cyberaudio Suite.description: A cheap and bulky interface for an audio enhancement.

Dynalar Modular Finger Enthusiast Cyberh.name: Dynalar Modular Finger Enthusiast Cyberhand
Dynalar Modular Finger Enthusiast Cyberh.description:
Borgware. Requires cyberarm. Comes with 8 cyberfingers*.

*Fingers must be added after installation

Flashbulb.name: Flashbulb
Flashbulb.description: Requires cyberarm. User can attempt to blind anyone within 25m/yds.

Flashlight Cyberfinger.name: Flashlight Cyberfinger
Flashlight Cyberfinger.description: Cyberfinger that holds a concealed Flashlight. Can only be installed on a modular finger cyberhand.

Hardened Shielding (Borgware).name: Hardened Shielding (Borgware)
Hardened Shielding (Borgware).description:
Borgware.

This is installed to is not affected by EMP effects.

Hardened Shielding (Cybereye).name: Hardened Shielding (Cybereye)
Hardened Shielding (Cybereye).description: The eye and installed options are not affected by EMP effects.

Hardened Shielding (Internal).name: Hardened Shielding (Internal)
Hardened Shielding (Internal).description:
Internal Cyberware.

All internal cyberware is not affected by EMP effects.

Heuristic Health Monitor.name: Heuristic Health Monitor
Heuristic Health Monitor.description: Requires biomonitor. Can know HP at a glance.

Homing Tracer Cyberfinger.name: Homing Tracer Cyberfinger
Homing Tracer Cyberfinger.description: Cyberfinger that functions like a Homing Tracer. Can only be installed on a modular finger cyberhand.

Implanted Fūma Kotarō Linear Frame.name: Implanted Fūma Kotarō Linear Frame
Implanted Fūma Kotarō Linear Frame.description:
• Requires BODY 8, 2 Grafted Muscle and Bone Lace
  • Increases BODY stat to 12 (adjusting your HP, Wound Threshold, and Death Save)
  • Increase Stealth +2
  • Drawing and sheathing the frame's weapons does not require an Action
  • A Conceal check is not required for the weapons concealed in the frame.

  • Frame has one of two weapon options*:

    • Two excellent quality exotic heavy melee weapons
    • One excellent quality light melee weapon and one excellent quality exotic very heavy melee weapon

* Must be manually added.

Implanted LF-001 SWAT Linear Frame.name: Implanted LF-001 SWAT Linear Frame
Implanted LF-001 SWAT Linear Frame.description:
• Requires BODY 8, 2 Grafted Muscle and Bone Lace
  • Increases BODY stat to 12 (adjusting your HP, Wound Threshold, and Death Save)
  • Ignores the normal movement penalty for climbing and swimming

Implanted Vermilion Linear Frame.name: Implanted Vermilion Linear Frame
Implanted Vermilion Linear Frame.description:
• Requires BODY 8, 2 Grafted Muscle and Bone Lace
  • Increases BODY stat to 12 (adjusting your HP, Wound Threshold, and Death Save)
  • No movement penalty for jumping
  • Operates as if paired Skate Feet are installed

Integrated Cyberdeck Upgrade.name: Integrated Cyberdeck Upgrade
Integrated Cyberdeck Upgrade.description: Requires Cyberdeck (Hardwired), adds an extra slot to the cyberdeck.

Laser Pointer Cyberfinger.name: Laser Pointer Cyberfinger
Laser Pointer Cyberfinger.description: Cyberfinger holding a concealed Laser Pointer. Can only be installed on a modular finger cyberhand.

Lighter Cyberfinger.name: Lighter Cyberfinger
Lighter Cyberfinger.description: Cyberfinger holding a concealed lighter. Can only be installed on a modular finger cyberhand.

Lockpick Cyberfinger.name: Lockpick Cyberfinger
Lockpick Cyberfinger.description: Cyberfinger holding a concealed Lock Picking Set. Can only be installed on a modular finger cyberhand.

Microphone Cyberfinger.name: Microphone Cyberfinger
Microphone Cyberfinger.description: Cyberfinger holding a concealed recording device. Can only be installed on a modular finger cyberhand.

Mini Air Supply Cyberfinger.name: Mini Air Supply Cyberfinger
Mini Air Supply Cyberfinger.description: Cyberfinger with an integrated air tank. Can only be installed on a modular finger cyberhand.

Modular Finger Cyberhand.name: Modular Finger Cyberhand
Modular Finger Cyberhand.description:
Requires cyberarm. Comes with 5 cyberfingers*.

*Fingers must be added after installation

Neo-Soviet Cyberarm.name: Neo-Soviet Cyberarm
Neo-Soviet Cyberarm.description: A soviet cybernetical replacement arm. Comes with a free hand pre-installed. -1 to rolls requiring arm without BODY 8+.

One Shot Special Cyberfinger.name: One Shot Special Cyberfinger
One Shot Special Cyberfinger.description: Cyberfinger that holds a concealed Exotic Heavy Pistol. Can only be installed on a modular finger cyberhand.

Popup Net Launcher.name: Popup Net Launcher
Popup Net Launcher.description: A concealable exotic net launcher. Can't hold anything with this hand while activated.

Popup Shotgun.name: Popup Shotgun
Popup Shotgun.description:
A concealable shotgun. Comes with a smartgun link pre-installed*. Can't hold anything with this hand while activated.

* Smart Link must be manually added.

Reinforced Cyberarm Upgrade.name: Reinforced Cyberarm Upgrade
Reinforced Cyberarm Upgrade.description: Requires cyberarm. The cyberarm this is installed on cannot be broken.

Reinforced Cyberleg Upgrade.name: Reinforced Cyberleg Upgrade
Reinforced Cyberleg Upgrade.description: Requires cyberleg. The cyberleg this is installed on cannot be broken.

Sponsored Cybereye.name: Sponsored Cybereye
Sponsored Cybereye.description:
A replacement eye. Chyron comes pre-installed*. User randomly experiences random ads.

*Chyron must be added after installation

Spray Paint Cyberfinger.name: Spray Paint Cyberfinger
Spray Paint Cyberfinger.description: Cyberfinger functioning as a spray can. Can only be installed on a modular finger cyberhand.

Squirt Cyberfinger.name: Squirt Cyberfinger
Squirt Cyberfinger.description: Cyberfinger that can hold and spray various liquids. Can only be installed on a modular finger cyberhand.

Standard Cyberfinger.name: Standard Cyberfinger
Standard Cyberfinger.description: Cyberfinger. Can only be installed on a modular finger cyberhand.

Trauma Response Nanomatrix.name: Trauma Response Nanomatrix
Trauma Response Nanomatrix.description: Can fully repair skinweave or subdermal armor once a day.

Wirecutter/Scissors Cyberfingers.name: Wirecutter/Scissors Cyberfingers
Wirecutter/Scissors Cyberfingers.description: Cyberfinger pair that can serve as scissors or wirecutters. Can only be installed on a modular finger cyberhand.
